body.name: Mecity Coffee Maker 3-in-1 Single Serve Coffee Machine, Compatible with K-cup Coffee Capsule, Instant Coffee Brewer, Tea maker, 6,8,10 Oz Cup, Removable 50 Oz Water Reservoir, 120V 1150W
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 1 hr 14 mins
features: The Coffee Maker is Effortlessly Simple to Use - just add fresh water to the removable reservoir, pop in your favorite coffee pod, press the brew button, and enjoy fresh-brewed, delicious coffee in minutes

Also Good at Brewing Loose Tea - There are 3 filters in the coffee machine, when you want to have a cup of tea, you do not have to boil a kettle of water, just add leaf tea and wait a moment, then you can enjoy the sipping

Enjoy precise & quick brewing - This single serve coffee maker has a smart flow management system to realize the precise brewing, brew an 6, 8, or 10 oz. cup at the push of a button, and just wait for 60 to 100 seconds.

Fit anywhere on the countertop - the coffee machine is 6.3 inch in width and 10.6 inch in height, you can always find its space in your kitchen and portable for travel. The reservoir has a capacity of 50 fl Oz., capable of brewing 8 cups of drinks. Maximum fit cup size is 3.7" in width and 6.3" in height.

Easy to Clean - BPA-FREE material for water tank and piercing needle. Detachable filter basket and drip tray can be removed and washed directly. A easy clean method by pressing button after adding in water and vinegar.
Descale Mode - When the medium cup button and start button flashes, it is in descale mode, take out the pods, and brew 6 cups of hot water will finish descaling.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Update information From June 2023, the new coffee maker adopts an improved heating structure and enhances the quality of the pump, greatly reducing the failure rate and significantly extending the lifespan of the machine.From April 2023, the new coffee machine adopts a modern-style filter cup with an increased capacity, which helps prevent splashing and enhances the coffee's rich flavor.K-capsule filter pod *1 : for K-pod coffee capsules with flat bottom.Ground coffee & Tea filter pod *2 : for ground coffee and loose tea.

Features Sleek Design Made of BPA Free plastic and stainless steel, it looks sleek and saves space on your countertop, and portable for travel too. 3 Filters For Different Beverage Mecity coffee machine comes with 3 filters for K-pod capsule, ground coffee, leaf tea. (Please notice that there is sharp spine in K-pod capsule filter) Touch To Select Size Apart from the power on/off button, you can select 6/8/10 Ounce by one click, and the drink will be ready in around 60/80/100 seconds.

Removable Drip Tray Remove the drip tray when you need to place tall cups, it also could be cleaned easily. Suitable For Most Cups and Mugs The biggest cup that could fit in is 3.7 inch in diameter and 6.3 inch in height (after drip tray removed). 1.5 Liter Removable Water Tank Once full filled with water, you can brew 8 cups of coffee at max. Good choice for family usage. (1.5 Liter=50 fl.Oz)

Make Brewing Coffee More Easier With Mecity Coffee Maker Reminder for water shortage warning When the pump could not draw water to the heating area, it will keep beeping, all button lights keep flashing. In 2 occasions this will happen 1. Empty water tank: refill the water tank will fix this issue. 2. Water tank not installed in place: please press down the water tank to make sure the sealing is tight.

3 in 1 Coffee Maker Electric Goosneck Kettle Electric Tea Pot Electric Water Boiler Long Slot Toaster Masticating Juicer Body Material Stainless Steel and Plastic Stainless Steel Borosilicate glass and Stainless Steel Stainless Steel and Plastic Stainless Steel and Plastic Stainless Steel & ABS BPA Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Capacity 1.5 Liter 0.8 Liter 1.7 Liter 1.7 Liter 4 Slice Not Limited Feature 1 Instant Brewing Custom Temp 9 Preset Fast Heating 6 Browning Levels Small in Size Feature 2 K-Pod Server Keep Warm Custom Temp Cool Touch Bagel Mode High Juice Yield Feature 3 Touch Control LCD Display LCD Display Auto Shut-off Cool Touch Less Oxidation Thermal Insulation ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 size settings, super cute, makes coffee fast!
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest coffee maker, it runs really well, fast brewing, 3 cup sizes, came with 3 different pod cups, one for Keurig type pods and the other two are basket strainers for coffee or tea and a little scoop with a brush on it. I love it for my office. Coffee came out great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most Affordable and Versatile Brewer
reviews.reviewText: This is a great brewer with options for pods, loose coffee and loose tea.It is made well and easy to use. It brews quickly, which is nice.Note: the brewer will signal a descaling mode from time to time.This is a maintenance feature, don't freak out, your machine isn't malfuntioning, it is meant to do this to keep it clean and running smoothly. Read the instructions. If you want your machine to last, don't use tap water.I did have an issue with my machine and reached out to Mecity.I am very impressed because they responded to me in less than 24 hours.They honored their warranty, and I am very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just my size
reviews.reviewText: I received this single cup coffee maker about a month ago. Let me say, after using it every day since then, that it is just perfect for a single person. I make 2 cups of coffee every day, at least. I usually use the largest cup setting, which is 12 oz! I have read reviews that they don't have a cup that fits into the space it should go. That is a little bit different than a Kurig. It's not true that a regular sized coffe cup doesn't fit there. However, a thermos type cup will not work. This taller cup I have is the only one that works on the largest cup setting. The medium cup setting dispenses about 9 oz. The smallest cup setting dispenses a little more than 7 oz. The coffee is hot at 168 degrees. It comes with a holder for single kurig type pods but it also takes pods which have an indentation in the middle of the bottom if the pods. The piercing needle is on the side instead if the middle. It comes with a super holder for tea leaves and 2 holders for you own ground coffee. I found the coffee was not strong enough for my liking using my own grounds, even dark roast. Perhaps I'd like that feature using ground coffee in the tea leaf holder as it's mych deeper. Anyway, I am loving it. If you're a single person like me, I found trying to make a pot of coffee with just enough so I didn't waste it AND it didn't taste burnt by the time I was ready for my second cup just a total pain in the a**. This works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great machine at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace my high-end Keurig that died. It was a fraction of the price. The water reservoir holds a lot more water than you would think. The footprint on my counter is much smaller than the Keurig. It make a delicious cup of coffee and is easy to clean. The time it takes to make a 10 oz. cup is longer than the Keurig but it's worth the cost saving on the unit price. It also can use ground coffee and leaf tea as well as k-cups. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Greatest & Faster brewer ever- to last only 4 months!!!
reviews.reviewText: We loved this K-cup brewer!!! Brews so quickly!!! Easy to set-up, clean, maintain and use!!BUT after 4 months of use it was brewing in accurate size cups, so we descaled according to the instructions. Never made the right size cups again, then a week later it started making snorting noises, then, it melted the K-cup, and now it does not work at all.It was only good for 4 months = ( So if I want to pay 56.00 every four months it's worth it,BUT I do not want to pay $168.00/year. Therefore, this machine is not a good investment!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I found me a keeper and it was on sale.
reviews.reviewText: I have gone through two K cup coffee machines in the last month. One was a simple one like this and made nice hot coffee like this. Unfortunately that one took from 80 seconds to 300 seconds to make a cup of coffee depending on the size and it was inaccurate by 2 oz per cup.This one makes nice hot coffee in about 1 min 20seoncds. Temp for 167 to 169F in the cup, and 194F our of the machine (cup cools it down from room temperature). This is key in having i nice hot cup of coffee. Once you press the power button (which is touch sensitive as well as all the buttons) it start brewing right away at a slower pace compared to others. But I like this because you get a stronger better tasting cup of coffee.I like strong coffee and this is just about there (I only use bold coffees like Starbucks Italian & Keurig Sumatra). The reason why I say almost there is this machine actually pours 1oz more of coffee.So 6oz is 7oz, 8oz is 9oz and 10oz is 11oz. For most people this won't be an issue at all.For me it's only a small issue because it makes hotter coffee than my Keurig, and Ninja Duel Brew Pro.I know why did I buy another machine then. I like to change pots just like my wife likes to change curtains, throw pillows etc.It could be the extra ounce is because of the left over in the heater element. This machine doesn't end by blowing air out and the end of the cycle like others do.The bottom line. if you want a really nice looking coffee machine that brews a hot nice cup of coffee in just the right amount of time, then you can't go wrong.Don't let price fool you. You get what you pay for and this one gives you way more for the price of the machine. If you can wait, just ad it to your wish list. I goes on sale from time to time.One last note. It comes with two adapters to use for coffee or tea. Both which hold a fairly good amount of either.Update 9/1/23I used the regular grind coffee filter and adopter and this holds a lot of coffee grinds. This is the first K cup machine where I could use regular grinds and make a strong cup of coffee. In the photo I added it shows the size of a K cup and the filter. Realize that depending on the k cup you could have from half of the k cup size filled with coffee to about 7/8. They are never full. Compare this filter to any other and you will see it's larger than anything else. So if you only want a k cup every once in awhile and prefer ground coffee this is the machine for you. I am amazed how well this machine is performing compared to all my branded machines. A true winner in my book.
